title: Goldman Sachs exec behind the Apple Card leaves the company
content:
A Goldman Sachs executive credited for his work securing the Apple Card deal has left the company. Scott Young, chief commercial officer of Goldman’s Marcus business, will be joining fintech startup iCreditWorks next month.

more…

The post Goldman Sachs exec behind the Apple Card leaves the company appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A Goldman Sachs executive credited for his work securing the Apple Card deal in 2018 has left the company.
